SELECT Q.QNA_NO, Q.TITLE, Q.USER_ID, TO_CHAR(Q.CDATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE, Q.STATUS, Q.IS_SECRET, Q.CNT, P.PNAME, I.IMAGE_URL AS THUMB_URL FROM PRODUCT_QNA Q JOIN PRODUCT P ON Q.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE I ON P.PRODUCT_NO = I.PRODUCT_NO AND I.IS_THUMBNAIL = 'Y'
AND Q.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND Q.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND Q.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND (Q.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR Q.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
ORDER BY Q.QNA_NO DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
